We're thrilled to announce the development of a Duolingo-inspired language learning application specifically designed for Russian speakers to learn Czech. Our app combines cutting-edge technology with effective language acquisition methods to provide an engaging and efficient learning experience.

Key features include:
â€¢ Structured lessons covering vocabulary, grammar, and pronunciation
â€¢ Interactive exercises and gamification elements
â€¢ Progress tracking and performance analytics
â€¢ Spaced repetition algorithm for optimal retention

Built with React MUI, Node.js, and MongoDB, our app promises a seamless user experience across devices. We're excited to contribute to the field of language education and foster cultural exchange between Russian and Czech speakers.
